title: Becoming Myself: The Michelle Obama Story
author: Michelle Obama
description: Explore the life and journey of the former First Lady, Michelle Obama, in her own words.

title: Steve Jobs: The Man Behind Apple
author: Walter Isaacson
description: A comprehensive biography of the visionary co-founder of Apple, Steve Jobs.

title: The Diary of Anne Frank
author: Anne Frank
description: Read the poignant and powerful diary of Anne Frank, a Jewish girl hiding from the Nazis during World War II.

title: Elon Musk: Tesla, SpaceX, and the Quest for a Fantastic Future
author: Ashlee Vance
description: Learn about the extraordinary life and ambitions of entrepreneur Elon Musk.

title: Malala: My Story of Standing Up for Girls' Rights
author: Malala Yousafzai
description: Follow the inspiring journey of Malala Yousafzai, the youngest-ever Nobel Prize laureate.

title: Leonardo da Vinci: The Renaissance Man
author: Walter Isaacson
description: Explore the life and genius of the legendary Renaissance artist and inventor, Leonardo da Vinci.

title: Hidden Figures: The Untold Story of the Black Women Mathematicians Who Helped Win the Space Race
author: Margot Lee Shetterly
description: Discover the incredible true story of the black women mathematicians who played crucial roles in NASA during the Space Race.

title: Nelson Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom
author: Nelson Mandela
description: Read the inspiring autobiography of Nelson Mandela, the iconic anti-apartheid revolutionary.

title: Marie Curie: A Life of Discovery
author: Fran√ßoise Giroud
description: Discover the life and groundbreaking achievements of Nobel Prize-winning scientist Marie Curie.

title: Walt Disney: The Man Behind the Magic
author: Bob Thomas
description: Explore the life and legacy of the legendary animator and entrepreneur, Walt Disney.

title: Rosa Parks: The Mother of the Civil Rights Movement
author: Douglas Brinkley
description: Learn about the courage and impact of Rosa Parks, a pivotal figure in the Civil Rights Movement.
